``` {r}

depart_final$id = as.factor(depart_final$id) #make the individual ID read as a factor, not integer
depart_final <- depart_final_unscaled %>%
  mutate(
    ordinal_date = scale(ordinal_date),
    distance = scale(distance)
  )

m <- glmer(roost ~ distance + distance^2 + sex + ordinal_date + sex:ordinal_date + moon.phase + (1|colony/id), data=depart_final, family="binomial")

#examine diagnostic plots
check_model(m) #appears to be overdispersed, try quasi-binomial
plot(m)

Anova(m,type=3)
summary(m)
effects_m =allEffects(m)
plot(allEffects(m))
vif(m)



mq <- glmer(roost ~ distance + distance^2 + sex + ordinal_date + sex:ordinal_date + moon.phase + (1|colony/id), data=depart_final, family="quasibinomial")

```
